tool_description: It will fetch crytpo news based on specific coin field passed to it.
name: Get Crypto news from different sources
title: Get Crypto news from different sources
tool_name: Get Crypto news from different sources

api_list.name: Get Bitcoin news from specific source
api_list.description: Get Bitcoin news from specific source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://get-crypto-news-from-different-sources.p.rapidapi.com/CoinDCX"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "get-crypto-news-from-different-sources.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
